description:
Thanks to a little help from a friend, Luffy saves his mates from a ghost ship captained by a deranged Dutchman! Unfortunately, their happy reunion is cut short by a volcanic eruption! Can the Hats take the heat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Undersea Volcanic Eruption! Drifting to the Fish-Man Island!
¡Volcán submarino en erupción! Aproximándose a la isla Gyojin
Éruption volcanique sous-marine ! Propulsés vers l’île des Hommes-Poissons !
Извержение подводного вулкана! Остров Рыболюдей уже близко!
ثوران بركان تحمائيّ! الانجراف إلى جزيرة البرمائيّين
海底火山噴火! 流されて魚人島
